content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 53, "index": 21}, {"type": "magenta_concrete", "quantity": 61, "index": 23}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 28, "index": 29}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 36, "index": 36}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft chiseled_nether_bricks, I first need to craft nether_brick_slab. To do this, I need to place 3 nether_bricks in the top row of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move 1 nether_brick from slot 39 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now I can craft the nether_brick_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
